# OddsFlow Partners

> AI-powered odds intelligence and agentic AI infrastructure for sportsbooks and odds feed providers. Real-time odds monitoring, anomaly detection, feed quality auditing, custom AI agents, Agent-to-Agent protocol, and Agent Reputation Network.

## Documentation

- [Platform Overview](https://www.oddsflow-partners.com/docs/overview.md): What OddsFlow Partners does
- [Odds Monitoring](https://www.oddsflow-partners.com/docs/odds-monitoring.md): Real-time surveillance and anomaly detection
- [Agentic AI](https://www.oddsflow-partners.com/docs/agentic-ai.md): Custom AI agents for sportsbook platforms

## Solutions

- [For Sportsbooks](https://www.oddsflow-partners.com/docs/sportsbook-solutions.md): Risk management and odds quality
- [For Feed Providers](https://www.oddsflow-partners.com/docs/feed-provider-solutions.md): Feed auditing and certification

## Technology

- [Intelligence Engine](https://www.oddsflow-partners.com/docs/technology.md): Shin de-vig, ensemble ML, signal types
- [Agent Protocol](https://www.oddsflow-partners.com/docs/agent-protocol.md): Agent-to-Agent communication spec
- [Agent Reputation](https://www.oddsflow-partners.com/docs/agent-reputation.md): Trust scoring for AI agents

- [Pricing](https://www.oddsflow-partners.com/docs/pricing.md): Plans and pricing
